snippet: DumbDumb, a company founded by the comedians Will Arnett and Jason Bateman, is offering advertisers a chance to run sponsored comedy videos on the TBS Web site.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column; DumbDumb and TBS plan to offer marketers a chance to run sponsored comedy videos online; DumbDumb, which was founded by comedians Will Arnett and Jason Bateman, will create the videos in the vein of what is known as branded content or branded entertainment.
lead_paragraph: DumbDumb, a company founded by the comedians Will Arnett and Jason Bateman, is offering advertisers a chance to run sponsored comedy videos on the TBS Web site.

headline.seo: DumbDumb Mixes Ads and Comedy Shorts for TBS Online
headline.main: Mixing Ads and Comedy Shorts Online for TBS
headline.print_headline: Mixing Ads and Comedy Shorts Online for TBS
